= Version 2.1-SNAPSHOT =
  * Updated LGPL from version 2.1 to 3.0
  * Fix for [http://code.google.com/p/vt-middleware/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 4], keystore incompatibility with keytool.
  * Add API for reading X.509 certificate extended attributes, [http://code.google.com/p/vt-middleware/issues/detail?id=1].
  * Add capability to format X.509 subject and issuer DNs, [http://code.google.com/p/vt-middleware/issues/detail?id=18].
  * Refactor !X509DnUtil into DNUtils to leverage new DN formatting classes and to operate on [http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/javax/security/auth/x500/X500Principal.html X500Principal] instances instead of [http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/security/cert/X509Certificate.html X509Certificate].

= Version 2.0 =
Initial google code release.
